boardgame.name: rallyman
Rallyman
Rallyman 1.144
Rallyman: 110 % Rallye
boardgame.description: In the racing game Rallyman, before you can start the race, you need to create your rally track by connecting the sides of 1-4 double-sided boards, with one side of each board featuring asphalt and the other side snow._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The movement system is simple: Each die rolled, you advance one space. So you have five dice for each of the speeds and two of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;gas_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; to continue moving without changing your speed. Each die is playable exactly once each turn. When you stop your movement, you take a card corresponding to the last speed that you started: the higher your speed, the lower your time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The track has both straight sections and turns that require a certain speed so that you can pass with different manners (by skidding, sharp turning, ...). You must roll the die because it determines the speed selected, but may show a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; which will put you in danger. With the third _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; displayed, your car will risk going spinning off the road, resulting in loss of time (1'00_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; instead of the scheduled time on your card), but sometimes also damage to the vehicle depending on the landscape in which you crash._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of each round, each player adds his times to his total time. The winner is the player who accumulates the least total time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The ability to take risks to scrape off a few seconds or in the management of your tires adds more to the simulation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is a bundle of some Rallyman _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;collectibles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for sale. Four cloth/rubber backed Rallyman mats featuring the four tarmac tracks from the Rallyman game - each blown up to 120cm by 80cm. These were purchased off the designer about a year ago and are too large for my limited play space. They look incredible, and are designed to be used with model rally cars. Read on :) To go with this, there are 12 Majorette model rally cars at 1/57 scale (I think) - these are all different models and feature the Imprezza, Lancer, 206, and so on. Finally, there are my four made up Rallyman Dirt boards, which are mounted on the reverse of a spare set of Rallyman boards from the base game. They have been carefully mounted, look very good, and fit perfectly with the boards from the base game. I quoted shipping to Far North QLD at $24... if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re closer to Melbourne than that, it will be appreciably cheaper. I will consider shipping overseas if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re that keen to eat the postage. Thanks for looking.

Rallyman - Rallyman Language: Dutch, English, German, French, Italian _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Spanish Players: 1 to 4 Age: 9+ Duration: about 60 min Weight: 1.550 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Free the driver in you! At the wheel of your Micro Rally Car, fight for every second in the rally on your table with your friends and family. Gear ratios, notes, turns, slips, strings, moguls, snow, choice of tires, road trips, big attack, stopwatch, assistance ... All ingredients are gathered here for a rally simulation acclaimed by the players! The 4 double sided race boards feature dry track and snowcovered track. Using these 4 boards, you will be able to play a different race each time as they can be combined in countless ways. And a great innovation: the points are scored according to the time on the race track! Between aerodynamic steering and risk management, you will win the race? See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
